oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Sir Hubert Wilkins, Artic Explorer, with James G. Stahlman, 1940
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A formal banquet with Sir Hubert Wilkins (gentleman with a goatee) and Nashville Banner Publisher James G. Stahlman and others circa 1940. Sir (George) Hubert Wilkins was an Australia polar explorer, ornithologist, pilot, soldier, geographer, and photographer. Forms part of Record Group 412, Photographs Collection. 1 photograph negative : b & w ; 4 x 5 in.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Wilkins, George H. (George Hubert), Sir, 1888-1958; Stahlman, James Geddes, 1893-
Explorers; Dinners and dining
